name: Codeigniter.2015.lessons
body:
### Background
Here you will find all projects I have made during the course "2 TI: Dynamische webapplicaties in PHP [Z55239]", at Thomas More Geel. These are all small webapps designed to teach PHP, in preparation of a larger project in the second semester of this year.

### Contact
Should you have any questions whatsoever, be sure to contact me at ti83magic@hotmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
